name: Highly opiniated structure to start a project faster.
Quick user experience with loading and transitional states.
Optimized developer experience (DX) through npm/yarn scripts.
Authentic and cool-looking initial seed users and items.
Flexible customizable interface with automatic color theme.
Get and display data resources such as users and items.
Search items with adapted browser URL query.
Simple user authentication and authorization flow.
Edit user profile and avatar with dynamic indicator on navigation.
Multi environment configuration for development, test, and production.
